New Records: Anthony Edwards set a new career high with 53 points in the Timberwolves loss to the Pistons.
Key Match Events: Anthony Edwards delivered a career performance, erupting for 53 points including going 10-for-15 from 3-point range.
Despite Edwards’ dominant efforts, the Timberwolves fell short in a 119-105 loss to the Detroit Pistons.
Detroit guard Cade Cunningham scored a season-high 40 points, surpassing his previous season high of 35 points against Milwaukee on Nov. 13.
